mapper.update: update Role set State=2 where RoleID=#{RoleID}
update Role set State=1 where RoleID=#{RoleID}
update Role set State=0 where RoleID=#{RoleID}
mapper.select: select R.RoleID,R.Role,R.State, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT U.UserName) as UserName,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT F.Func) as Func from Role as R left join UserRole as UR on R.RoleID=UR.RoleID left join UserT as U on UR.UserID=U.UserID left join RoleFunc as RF on RF.RoleID=R.RoleID left join Func as F on RF.FuncID=F.FuncID where R.State=0 group by R.RoleID;

select R.RoleID,R.Role,R.State, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT U.UserName) as UserName,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT F.Func) as Func from Role as R left join UserRole as UR on R.RoleID=UR.RoleID left join UserT as U on UR.UserID=U.UserID left join RoleFunc as RF on RF.RoleID=R.RoleID left join Func as F on RF.FuncID=F.FuncID where R.State=1 group by R.RoleID;
